events.message: I ordered a jacket last week but I want to return it because it doesn't fit at all and I need a refund.
The customer's issue has been classified under Refund due to their request for a return and money back.
Assigning the refund request to the returns specialist team for resolution.
Hello! Thanks for contacting us about your jacket return. I am here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original packaging?
My order number is 987654321, and yes, the jacket is unused and still in its original packaging unopened.
Thank you for the details. You are eligible for a full refund. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid return label we will email shortly.
Sounds good, I appreciate the quick help. I'll send it back today and await the refund confirmation.
The refund request is now processed. Once we receive the returned jacket, your money will be refunded within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if anything else is needed.
We are closing this case as the refund has been completed and no further action is required from your side.
